name: Bella
description: A friendly and playful golden retriever who loves to play fetch and cuddle.

name: Milo
description: A curious tabby cat who enjoys exploring and lounging in the sun.

name: Buddy
description: A loyal labrador who loves to run and play with other dogs. Great family pet.

name: Luna
description: A sweet siamese cat with striking blue eyes. She enjoys being pampered and sitting in laps.

name: Charlie
description: A playful and energetic beagle. Loves to explore and is good with kids.

name: Fluffy
description: A sweet and calm rabbit who enjoys snuggling and hopping around the yard.

name: Peanut
description: A playful and energetic hamster who loves running in her wheel and exploring small tunnels.

name: Toby
description: A slow-moving but curious turtle, enjoys swimming in his water tank and basking in the sun.
